entries.title_d: The Rebels have targeted the rich Imperial shipping lanes of Naboo as a good source of supplies. The recent attacks on Imperial cargo vessels has prompted the Emperor to demand all Imperial shipping is to have a fighter escort as it moves through the Naboo system.
entries.title: Naboo System: Escort the Imperial Freighters Duty
entries.thanks_5: Word of your success shall reach the Emperor.
entries.thanks_4: Word of your success shall reach the Emperor.
entries.thanks_3: Word of your success shall reach the Emperor.
entries.thanks_2: Word of your success shall reach the Emperor.
entries.thanks_1: Word of your success shall reach the Emperor.
entries.taunt_5: Time for you to say goodbye.
entries.taunt_4: You will only feel this for a second.
entries.taunt_3: Hand over the freighter, Imperial dog.
entries.taunt_2: So sad. It is a shame you have to die so young.
entries.taunt_1: I don't know why I was worried...the Empire is pathetic.
entries.shields_depleted: I just lost my shields. I cannot hold out for much longer.
entries.reason_5: This cargo must make it to Endor.
entries.reason_4: In the name of the Emperor, protect us until we jump.
entries.reason_3: This cargo must make it to Endor.
entries.reason_2: Word is the rebellion is interested in stopping us from reaching Endor.
entries.reason_1: Watch over us until we can get to our jump location.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the arrival location and wait for the arrival of the freighter.
entries.quest_location_d: The vessels entering the Naboo system are to be met by an escort. You will receive a navigation waypoint to the arrival location of your assigned freighter when you enter Naboo system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Once the freighter arrives, follow it to it's destination. Watch out for Rebel fighters who might try to take the freighter for their own.
entries.panic_3: Rebel scum! They are all yours, pilot.
entries.panic_1: Rebel! They are coming right at me!
entries.hull_half: Hull strength cut in half. Get these fighters off of me!
entries.goodbye_5: I shall inform high command of your success.
entries.goodbye_4: You have served the Emperor well.
entries.goodbye_3: Thanks for playing watch dog, pilot.
entries.goodbye_2: I shall inform high command of your success.
entries.goodbye_1: You have served the Emperor well.
entries.found_loc: Travel to the waypoint and await the arrival of the freighter.
entries.failed_protect: You have failed to protect the freighter. Return to base and make a full report of your actions.
entries.failed_destroy: The freighter has been destroyed. Return to base and make a full report on your failure.
entries.complete: Transport has been escorted to safety.
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 <Enemy fighters have been eliminated.>
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 <Enemy fighters detected. Incomming on attack vector.>
entries.arrived_at_loc: Maintain at this location for further instructions.
entries.abort: Abort message recieved. Return to base.
